.. cs.workflow/workflow_api/en documentation master file
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Powerscript API
###############

PowerScript is the development environment of the system,
which enables you to develop add ons, user exits, stand alone scripts or
complex applications based on or integrated with the |cs.platform|. This document
only describes the APIs that are important for the |cs.workflow| package. A
powerscript manual is part of the |cs.platform| documenation.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   process_interface
   task_interface
   form_interface
   briefcase_interface
   catalog_interface
